title: Proud Mary
lyrics:
[slow ‘n’ low]
(D)Left a good job in the city (D)workin' for the man every night and day
(D)I never lost one minute of sleepin' (D)worryin' 'bout the way that things might've been
 
(A)Big wheel keeps on turnin', (Bm)Proud Mary keeps on (G)burnin'
(D)Rollin' (rollin’)... rollin' (rollin’)... (D)rollin' on the river
 
(D)Cleaned a lot of plates in Memphis… I (D)pumped a lot of 'tane down in New Orleans
(D)But I never saw the good side of the city un(D)til I hitched a ride on the riverboat queen
 
(A)Big wheel keeps on turnin', (Bm)Proud Mary keep on (G)burnin'
(D)Rollin' (rollin’)... rollin' (rollin’)... (D)rollin' on the river
(D)Rollin' (rollin’)... rollin' (rollin’)... (D)rollin' on the river [pause]
 
[fast ‘n’ furious] 1, 2, 3, 4 (D) (D)
 
Well I (D)left a good job in the city (D)workin' for the man every night and day
(D)But I never lost one minute of sleepin' (D)worryin' 'bout the way things might've been (G-G)
 
[chorus]
(A)Big wheel keeps on turnin', (Bm)Proud Mary keeps on (G)burnin'
(D)Rollin' ... rollin' ... (D)rollin' on the river
(D)Rollin' ... rollin' ... (D)rollin' on the river
Yeah we (D)roll do-do-do-do… do-do-do-do (D) do-do-do-do
(C-A) (C-A) (C-A) (G-F-G)
 
(D)Cleaned a lot of plates in Memphis, (D)pumped a lot of 'tane down in New Orleans
(D)But I never saw the good side of the city, (D)till' I hitched a ride on the riverboat queen
 
[chorus]
(A)Big wheel keeps on turnin', (Bm)Proud Mary keeps on (G)burnin'
(D)Rollin' ... rollin' ... (D)rollin' on the river
(D)Rollin' ... rollin' ... (D)rollin' on the river
Yeah we (D)roll do-do-do-do… do-do-do-do (D) do-do-do-do
(C-A) (C-A) (C-A) (G-F-G)
 
[softer]
(D)If you come down to the river… I (D)bet you're gonna find some people who live
And (D)you don't have to worry if you got no money, (D)people on the river are happy to give (G-G)
 
[chorus]
(A)Big wheel keeps on turnin', (Bm)Proud Mary keeps on (G)burnin'
(D)Rollin' ... rollin' ... (D)rollin' on the river
(D)Rollin' ... rollin' ... (D)rollin' on the river
Yeah we (D)roll do-do-do-do… do-do-do-do (D) do-do-do-do
(C-A) (C-A) (C-A) (G-F-G)
 
(D)Rollin'... rollin'... (D)rollin' on the river
(D)Rollin'... rollin'... (D)rollin' on the river
(D)Rollin'... rollin'... (D)rollin' on the river
(C-A) (C-A) (C-A) (G-F-G)
(G-single strum) [end]
